latest_project.description: I am currently working together with other teens from all over Europe to organise a satellite hackathon called “eurohacks”. I am personally working on the marketing and the online event. Go check out eurohacks.orgto learn more about the event and leave us a follow@eurohacks2025

projects.title: Random Fact
projects.description: A website that gives you random facts, using the wikipedia api

projects.title: Find my
projects.description: A Program for an ESP32 to determine the position of a Bluetooth device to prevent the Device from getting left behind

projects.title: Autonomous Robot
projects.description: For the 'wro future engineers' competition I built the software for our robot. It uses an neuronal network and multiple algorithms to navigate the parkour.

blog.title: My first blog post
blog.description: I wrote my first blog post about the development of this website
